title: Hello World - Welcome to My Blog
excerpt: This is the first post on my new blog. Welcome to my corner of the web!
content:
Welcome!

Hello and welcome to my new blog! I'm excited to share my thoughts, projects, and discoveries with you.

Why I Started This

I've always wanted a space to document my work and share interesting things I find online. This retro-styled Windows 95 aesthetic felt like the perfect fit for a personal blog in 2025.

What You'll Find Here

Expect posts about:

  • Web development and design
  • Cool projects I'm working on
  • Interesting links and resources
  • Thoughts on tech and the web

Let's Stay in Touch

Feel free to sign the guestbook to leave a message. I read every entry!
